    • findEmptyTile

      public Pair<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> findEmptyTile​(float startX, float startY)
      Finds coordinate that the item can be placed without overlapping with another item or the tile is not blocked.
      Parameters:
      startX - x coordinate of the tile to check around
      startY - y coordinate of the tile to check around
      Returns:
      a pair of coordinates
